body_html:
I just looked into this, sounds like it is an issue of float32 vs float64, use float64 gives diff=0:

import torch

inputSize = 70
outputSize = 50
batchSize = 20

linear = torch.nn.Linear(inputSize, outputSize).double()

inp = torch.Tensor(range(batchSize*inputSize)).reshape(batchSize, inputSize).double()

out1 = linear(inp)

lst = []
for i in range(batchSize):
    o = linear(inp[i:i+1])
    lst.append(o)
out2 = torch.cat(lst, 0)

print("diff=", (out1-out2).abs().sum().item())

('diff=', 0.0)
